gobblin.runtime.locks

Class FileBasedJobLockFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.runtime.locks.FileBasedJobLockFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JobLockFactory<FileBasedJobLock>, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class FileBasedJobLockFactory
extends Object
implements JobLockFactory<FileBasedJobLock>
    A factory for file-based job locks. All locks are presented as files under a common directory. If the directory does not exist, it will be automatically created and removed on close().

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String FS_URI_CONFIG
      The URI of the file system with the directory for lock files
